page.title: 14BUTTERLEY FARM
page.content: Total area............160 acres Arable.................32 acres Grassland.............128 acres Crops...12 acres wheat, 3 acres roots, 60 acres silage. Uses of silage..food for cows & cattle. Farm machinery..1 combine, 2 jeeps, 1 lorry, 1 land-rover, 5 tractors, 2 cars. Equipment for...baling, fertilisng, ploughing, muck-spreading. Animals. 130 milking cows, 24 beef cattle, 4 calves, 9 goslings, 3 horses, 1 bull, 3 sheep-dogs. Milk a week.........7637galls Buildings. 3 barns, 2 pig-houses, 1 milking parlour, 1 hen-house, 1 farm-house, 2 silage sheds People...4 live on farm, 2 work on farm, 1 employed on farm.
